mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO requestforquotemain ( request, status, clientId, bookCode, lotSize, isOTC, notionalMillions, notionalCurrency, notionalFXRate, contracts, multiplier, quantity, dayCountConvention, premiumSettlementCurrency, premiumSettlementDate, premiumSettlementDaysOverride, premiumSettlementFXRate, salesCreditAmount, salesCreditPercentage, salesCreditFXRate, salesCreditCurrency, salesComment, traderComment, clientComment, premiumAmount, premiumPercentage, impliedVol, delta, gamma, vega, theta, rho, deltaNotional, gammaNotional, vegaNotional, thetaNotional, rhoNotional, deltaShares, gammaShares, vegaShares, thetaShares, rhoShares, totalPremium, hedgePrice, hedgeType, askFinalAmount, askFinalPercentage, askImpliedVol, askPremiumAmount, askPremiumPercentage, bidFinalAmount, bidFinalPercentage, bidImpliedVol, bidPremiumAmount, bidPremiumPercentage, tradeDate, expiryDate, pickedUpBy, timeValue, intrinsicValue, lambda, underlyingRIC, underlyingPrice, savedBy)
VALUES( #{request}, #{status, typeHandler=org.apache.ibatis.type.EnumTypeHandler}, #{clientId}, #{bookCode}, #{lotSize}, #{isOTC}, #{notionalMillions}, #{notionalCurrency}, #{notionalFXRate}, #{contracts}, #{multiplier}, #{quantity}, #{dayCountConvention}, #{premiumSettlementCurrency}, #{premiumSettlementDate}, #{premiumSettlementDaysOverride}, #{premiumSettlementFXRate}, #{salesCreditAmount}, #{salesCreditPercentage}, #{salesCreditFXRate}, #{salesCreditCurrency}, #{salesComment}, #{traderComment}, #{clientComment}, #{premiumAmount}, #{premiumPercentage}, #{impliedVol}, #{delta}, #{gamma}, #{vega}, #{theta}, #{rho}, #{deltaNotional}, #{gammaNotional}, #{vegaNotional}, #{thetaNotional}, #{rhoNotional}, #{deltaShares}, #{gammaShares}, #{vegaShares}, #{thetaShares}, #{rhoShares}, #{totalPremium}, #{hedgePrice}, #{hedgeType, typeHandler=org.apache.ibatis.type.EnumTypeHandler}, #{askFinalAmount}, #{askFinalPercentage}, #{askImpliedVol}, #{askPremiumAmount}, #{askPremiumPercentage}, #{bidFinalAmount}, #{bidFinalPercentage}, #{bidImpliedVol}, #{bidPremiumAmount}, #{bidPremiumPercentage}, #{tradeDate}, #{expiryDate}, #{pickedUpBy}, #{timeValue}, #{intrinsicValue}, #{lambda}, #{underlyingRIC}, #{underlyingPrice}, #{lastUpdatedBy})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM requestforquotemain ORDER BY identifier DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE requestforquotemain SET status = #{status, typeHandler=org.apache.ibatis.type.EnumTypeHandler}, clientId = #{clientId}, bookCode = #{bookCode}, lotSize = #{lotSize}, isOTC = #{isOTC}, notionalMillions = #{notionalMillions}, notionalCurrency = #{notionalCurrency}, notionalFXRate = #{notionalFXRate}, contracts = #{contracts}, multiplier = #{multiplier}, quantity = #{quantity}, premiumSettlementCurrency = #{premiumSettlementCurrency}, premiumSettlementDate = #{premiumSettlementDate}, premiumSettlementDaysOverride = #{premiumSettlementDaysOverride}, premiumSettlementFXRate = #{premiumSettlementFXRate}, salesCreditAmount = #{salesCreditAmount}, salesCreditPercentage = #{salesCreditPercentage}, salesCreditFXRate = #{salesCreditFXRate}, salesCreditCurrency = #{salesCreditCurrency}, salesComment = #{salesComment}, traderComment = #{traderComment}, clientComment #{clientComment}, deltaNotional = #{deltaNotional}, gammaNotional = #{gammaNotional}, vegaNotional = #{vegaNotional}, thetaNotional = #{thetaNotional}, rhoNotional = #{rhoNotional}, deltaShares = #{deltaShares}, gammaShares = #{gammaShares}, vegaShares = #{vegaShares}, thetaShares = #{thetaShares}, rhoShares = #{rhoShares}, hedgePrice = #{hedgePrice}, hedgeType = #{hedgeType, typeHandler=org.apache.ibatis.type.EnumTypeHandler}, askFinalAmount = #{askFinalAmount}, askFinalPercentage = #{askFinalPercentage}, askImpliedVol = #{askImpliedVol}, askPremiumAmount = #{askPremiumAmount}, askPremiumPercentage = #{askPremiumPercentage}, bidFinalAmount = #{bidFinalAmount}, bidFinalPercentage = #{bidFinalPercentage}, bidImpliedVol = #{bidImpliedVol}, bidPremiumAmount = #{bidPremiumAmount}, bidPremiumPercentage = #{bidPremiumPercentage}, pickedUpBy = #{pickedUpBy}, lastUpdatedBy = #{lastUpdatedBy} WHERE identifier = #{identifier}
